title: House in the Hills + Pool
posting_body: Private house 3700 sq' - Pool on RoofTop - Deck on Rooftop - Views (canyon) - 4 Bedrooms 4 Baths - Master BR very large like a suite with Jacuzzi - Lots of sun lights - 4 Parking spaces (2 car garage + 2 external) - 3 stories - Possible seperate unit with private entry - Laundry room - Central AC heat - Aquarium - Duble windows - furnished possible
